dialog.body: My "home office". It was really just a desk in the corner of the living room, but it was enough room for my computer and my drawer of important-things-that-should-really-be-better-organized.
I was starting to find myself having more and more trouble concentrating. My eyelids felt like lead, and I kept finding excuses to distract myself.
dialog.option: 1. I layed my head down on the desk and closed my eyes.
2. I got up and went to the kitchen to do some dishes.

dialog.body: I could hear the air conditioner droning in the next room. Traffic rumbled from the overpass a few blocks away. A few crickets thrummed.
